Articles.Content:
i think it was this quote although i may have misinterpreted in which case i apologize

although me mentioning a short time, that was an assumption which i will remove if asked

I apologize for the misunderstanding. I intended to say that it is more stable to maintain the current pace and put SDHI as a prerequisite (but with less dependency than it). One more reason is I appreciate sumghai's work so much for me to rip it off. I still use it from time to time and been using it ever since.
Just so we can be clear, you're going to update this, right? This is a beautiful mod and I would love to see it in 0.90!

I will, but this is already released for 0.25 in here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76170-0-25-Aerojet-Kerbodyne-3-0-%28Sept5-Complete-Remodel-ICPS-Umbilicals-and-More%21%29/page45

Not sure if it works on 0.90 but will update soon enough.
Seeing as Firespitter and AdvancedDecouplers have already been updated, this part pack should be woeking just fine. I've been using it on my .90 install with no issues to report.
Sorry blackheart, that's one thing I didn't get a chance to check.
It's fine, though disregarding SDHI's dependencies (which we will know once SDHI is updated), most of AK's dependencies are up to date.
very nice new stuff. I'll definetly use it.
Can we post over the release thread instead? Thanks guys
